verses.verse: <S%G5119>Then<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2980>spoke<s%> to the <S%G3793>multitudes<s%> and to His <S%G3101>disciples,<s%>
<S%G3004>saying,<s%> "The <S%G1122>scribes<s%> and the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> have <S%G2523>seated<s%> <S%G2523>themselves<s%> in the <S%G2515>chair<s%> of <S%G3475>Moses;<s%>

<S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> that they <S%G3004>tell<s%> you, <S%G4160>do<s%> and <S%G5083>observe,<s%> but do not <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to their <S%G2041>deeds;<s%> for they <S%G3004>say<s%> [things,] and do not <S%G4160>do<s%> [them.]

"And they <S%G1195>tie<s%> up <S%G926>heavy<s%> <S%G5413>loads,<s%> and <S%G2007>lay<s%> them on men's <S%G5606>shoulders;<s%> but they <S%G846>themselves<s%> are <S%G3756>unwilling<s%> <S%G2309><s%> to <S%G2795>move<s%> them with [so much as] a <S%G1147>finger.<s%>

"But they <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> their <S%G2041>deeds<s%> to be <S%G2300>noticed<s%> by <S%G444>men;<s%> for they <S%G4115>broaden<s%> their <S%G5440>phylacteries,<s%> and <S%G3170>lengthen<s%> the <S%G2899>tassels<s%> [of their garments.]
"And they <S%G5368>love<s%> the <S%G4411>place<s%> of <S%G4411>honor<s%> at <S%G1173>banquets,<s%> and the <S%G4410>chief<s%> <S%G4410>seats<s%> in the <S%G4864>synagogues,<s%>
and respectful <S%G783>greetings<s%> in the <S%G58>market<s%> <S%G58>places,<s%> and being <S%G2564>called<s%> by <S%G444>men,<s%> <S%G4461>Rabbi.<s%>
"But do not be <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G4461>Rabbi;<s%> for <S%G1520>One<s%> is your <S%G1320>Teacher,<s%> and you are <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G80>brothers.<s%>
"And do not <S%G2564>call<s%> [anyone] on <S%G1093>earth<s%> your <S%G3962>father;<s%> for <S%G1520>One<s%> is your <S%G3962>Father,<s%> He who is in <S%G3770>heaven.<s%>
"And do not be <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G2519>leaders;<s%> for <S%G1520>One<s%> is your <S%G2519>Leader,<s%> [that is,] <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>
"But the <S%G3173>greatest<s%> among you shall be your <S%G1249>servant.<s%>
"And <S%G3748>whoever<s%> <S%G5312>exalts<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%> shall be <S%G5013>humbled;<s%> and <S%G3748>whoever<s%> <S%G5013>humbles<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%> shall be <S%G5312>exalted.<s%>

"But <S%G3759>woe<s%> to you, <S%G1122>scribes<s%> and <S%G5330>Pharisees,<s%> <S%G5273>hypocrites,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> you <S%G2808>shut<s%> off the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G3772>heaven<s%> from <S%G444>men;<s%> for you do not <S%G1525>enter<s%> in <S%G4771>yourselves,<s%> <S%G3761>nor<s%> do you <S%G863>allow<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> who are <S%G1525>entering<s%> to <S%G1525>go<s%> in.

<S%G3759>["Woe<s%> to you, <S%G1122>scribes<s%> and <S%G5330>Pharisees,<s%> <S%G5273>hypocrites,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> you <S%G2719>devour<s%> widows' <S%G3614>houses,<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> while for a <S%G4392>pretense<s%> you <S%G4336>make<s%> <S%G3117>long<s%> <S%G4336>prayers;<s%> <S%G1223>therefore<s%> <S%G3778><s%> you shall <S%G2983>receive<s%> <S%G4053>greater<s%> <S%G2917>condemnation.<s%>]

<S%G3759>"Woe<s%> to you, <S%G1122>scribes<s%> and <S%G5330>Pharisees,<s%> <S%G5273>hypocrites,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> you <S%G4013>travel<s%> <S%G4013>about<s%> on <S%G2281>sea<s%> and <S%G3584>land<s%> to <S%G4160>make<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G4339>proselyte;<s%> and <S%G3752>when<s%> he <S%G1096>becomes<s%> one, you <S%G4160>make<s%> him <S%G1362>twice<s%> as <S%G1362>much<s%> a <S%G5207>son<s%> of <S%G1067>hell<s%> as <S%G4771>yourselves.<s%>

<S%G3759>"Woe<s%> to you, <S%G5185>blind<s%> <S%G3595>guides,<s%> who <S%G3004>say,<s%> <S%G3739>'Whoever<s%> <S%G302><s%> <S%G3660>swears<s%> by the <S%G3485>temple,<s%> that is <S%G3762>nothing;<s%> but <S%G3739>whoever<s%> <S%G302><s%> <S%G3660>swears<s%> by the <S%G5557>gold<s%> of the <S%G3485>temple,<s%> he is <S%G3784>obligated.<s%>'

"You <S%G3474>fools<s%> and <S%G5185>blind<s%> <S%G5185>men;<s%> <S%G5101>which<s%> is <S%G3173>more<s%> <S%G3173>important,<s%> the <S%G5557>gold,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> the <S%G3485>temple<s%> that <S%G37>sanctified<s%> the <S%G5557>gold<s%>?

"And, <S%G3739>'Whoever<s%> <S%G302><s%> <S%G3660>swears<s%> by the <S%G2379>altar,<s%> [that] is <S%G3762>nothing,<s%> but <S%G3739>whoever<s%> <S%G302><s%> <S%G3660>swears<s%> by the <S%G1435>offering<s%> upon it, he is <S%G3784>obligated.<s%>'

"You <S%G5185>blind<s%> <S%G5185>men,<s%> <S%G5101>which<s%> is <S%G3173>more<s%> <S%G3173>important,<s%> the <S%G1435>offering<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> the <S%G2379>altar<s%> that <S%G37>sanctifies<s%> the <S%G1435>offering<s%>?
<S%G3767>"Therefore<s%> he who <S%G3660>swears<s%> by the <S%G2379>altar,<s%> <S%G3660>swears<s%> [both] by the altar and by <S%G3956>everything<s%> on it.
"And he who <S%G3660>swears<s%> by the <S%G3485>temple,<s%> <S%G3660>swears<s%> [both] by the <S%G846>temple<s%> and by Him who <S%G2730>dwells<s%> <S%G2730>within<s%> it.
"And he who <S%G3660>swears<s%> by <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> <S%G3660>swears<s%> [both] by the <S%G2362>throne<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> and by Him who <S%G2521>sits<s%> upon it.

<S%G3759>"Woe<s%> to you, <S%G1122>scribes<s%> and <S%G5330>Pharisees,<s%> <S%G5273>hypocrites!<s%> For you <S%G586>tithe<s%> <S%G2238>mint<s%> and <S%G432>dill<s%> and <S%G2951>cummin,<s%> and have <S%G863>neglected<s%> the <S%G926>weightier<s%> <S%G926>provisions<s%> of the <S%G3551>law:<s%> <S%G2920>justice<s%> and <S%G1656>mercy<s%> and <S%G4102>faithfulness;<s%> but <S%G3778>these<s%> are the things you <S%G1163>should<s%> have <S%G4160>done<s%> <S%G3361>without<s%> <S%G863>neglecting<s%> the <S%G2548>others.<s%>
"You <S%G5185>blind<s%> <S%G3595>guides,<s%> who <S%G1368>strain<s%> out a <S%G2971>gnat<s%> and <S%G2666>swallow<s%> a <S%G2574>camel!<s%>

<S%G3759>"Woe<s%> to you, <S%G1122>scribes<s%> and <S%G5330>Pharisees,<s%> <S%G5273>hypocrites!<s%> For you <S%G2511>clean<s%> the <S%G1855>outside<s%> of the <S%G4221>cup<s%> and of the <S%G3953>dish,<s%> but <S%G2081>inside<s%> they are <S%G1073>full<s%> of <S%G724>robbery<s%> and self-indulgence.

"You <S%G5185>blind<s%> <S%G5330>Pharisee,<s%> <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G2511>clean<s%> the <S%G1787>inside<s%> of the <S%G4221>cup<s%> and of the <S%G3953>dish,<s%> <S%G2443>so<s%> that the <S%G1622>outside<s%> of it may <S%G1096>become<s%> <S%G2513>clean<s%> <S%G2532>also.<s%>

<S%G3759>"Woe<s%> to you, <S%G1122>scribes<s%> and <S%G5330>Pharisees,<s%> <S%G5273>hypocrites!<s%> For you are <S%G3945>like<s%> <S%G2867>whitewashed<s%> <S%G5028>tombs<s%> <S%G3748>which<s%> on the <S%G1855>outside<s%> <S%G5316>appear<s%> <S%G5611>beautiful,<s%> but <S%G2081>inside<s%> they are <S%G1073>full<s%> of <S%G3498>dead<s%> men's <S%G3747>bones<s%> and <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G167>uncleanness.<s%>

"Even <S%G3779>so<s%> you <S%G2532>too<s%> <S%G1855>outwardly<s%> <S%G5316>appear<s%> <S%G1342>righteous<s%> to <S%G444>men,<s%> but <S%G2081>inwardly<s%> you are <S%G3324>full<s%> of <S%G5272>hypocrisy<s%> and <S%G458>lawlessness.<s%>

<S%G3759>"Woe<s%> to you, <S%G1122>scribes<s%> and <S%G5330>Pharisees,<s%> <S%G5273>hypocrites!<s%> For you <S%G3618>build<s%> the <S%G5028>tombs<s%> of the <S%G4396>prophets<s%> and <S%G2885>adorn<s%> the <S%G3419>monuments<s%> of the <S%G1342>righteous,<s%>

and <S%G3004>say,<s%> <S%G1487>'If<s%> we had <S%G1510>been<s%> [living] in the <S%G2250>days<s%> of our <S%G3962>fathers,<s%> we would not have <S%G1510>been<s%> <S%G2844>partners<s%> with them in [shedding] the <S%G129>blood<s%> of the <S%G4396>prophets.<s%> '

<S%G5620>"Consequently<s%> you <S%G3140>bear<s%> <S%G3140>witness<s%> against <S%G1438>yourselves,<s%> that you are <S%G5207>sons<s%> of <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G5407>murdered<s%> the <S%G4396>prophets.<s%>
<S%G4137>"Fill<s%> up <S%G2532>then<s%> the <S%G3358>measure<s%> [of the guilt] of your <S%G3962>fathers.<s%>
"You <S%G3789>serpents,<s%> you <S%G1081>brood<s%> of <S%G2191>vipers,<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> shall you <S%G5343>escape<s%> the <S%G2920>sentence<s%> of <S%G1067>hell<s%>?

<S%G1223>"Therefore,<s%> <S%G3778><s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> I am <S%G649>sending<s%> you <S%G4396>prophets<s%> and <S%G4680>wise<s%> <S%G4680>men<s%> and <S%G1122>scribes;<s%> <S%G1537>some<s%> of them you will <S%G615>kill<s%> and <S%G4717>crucify,<s%> and <S%G1537>some<s%> of them you will <S%G3146>scourge<s%> in your <S%G4864>synagogues,<s%> and <S%G1377>persecute<s%> from <S%G4172>city<s%> to <S%G4172>city,<s%>

that upon you may <S%G2064>fall<s%> [the guilt of] <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G1342>righteous<s%> <S%G129>blood<s%> <S%G7062>shed<s%> on <S%G1093>earth,<s%> from the <S%G129>blood<s%> of <S%G1342>righteous<s%> Abel to the <S%G6>blood<s%> of <S%G129>Zechariah,<s%> the <S%G2197>son<s%> of <S%G5207>Berechiah,<s%> <S%G914>whom<s%> you <S%G3739>murdered<s%> <S%G5407>between<s%> the <S%G3342>temple<s%> and the <S%G3485>altar.<s%>
<S%G281>"Truly<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things<s%> shall <S%G2240>come<s%> upon <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1074>generation.<s%>

"O <S%G2419>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%G2419>Jerusalem,<s%> who <S%G615>kills<s%> the <S%G4396>prophets<s%> and <S%G3036>stones<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> who are <S%G649>sent<s%> to her! <S%G4212>How<s%> <S%G4212>often<s%> I <S%G2309>wanted<s%> to <S%G1996>gather<s%> your <S%G5043>children<s%> <S%G1996>together,<s%> the <S%G5158>way<s%> a <S%G3733>hen<s%> <S%G1996>gathers<s%> her <S%G3556>chicks<s%> <S%G5259>under<s%> her <S%G4420>wings,<s%> and you were <S%G3756>unwilling.<s%> <S%G2309><s%>
<S%G2400>"Behold,<s%> your <S%G3624>house<s%> is being <S%G863>left<s%> to you <S%G2048>desolate!<s%>

"For I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, from <S%G737>now<s%> on you shall not <S%G3708>see<s%> Me <S%G2193>until<s%> you <S%G3004>say,<s%> <S%G2127>'Blessed<s%> is He who <S%G2064>comes<s%> in the <S%G3686>name<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord!<s%>'"
